title: Airbnb CEO Chesky’s Bet on a Post-Pandemic Travel Boom
itunes:title: Airbnb CEO Chesky’s Bet on a Post-Pandemic Travel Boom
description:
We get the Businessweek Agenda with Bloomberg Intelligence Chief Equity Strategist Gina Martin Adams and Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson. Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU, provides a coronavirus update. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Real Estate Reporter Pat Clark discuss Airbnb CEO Brian Chesky’s expensive bet on a post-pandemic travel boom.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
